case.title: A Firm Warm Hand - 40 (London)
case.text: You're an educated, Professional or studying to be, High expectations Enjoy the finer things An attractive European girl Teen to 40's Single or not Feel good About life But Sometimes You just need that little Extra attention Retreat from the Rush and Indulge in Sensuality Intimacy and Warmth You've got that Shape that Deserves attention An Ass That Needs A Firm Warm Hand It's definitely your second most Erogenous zone Perhaps Your First It Could need Soft caresses Kisses Tasting Teasing Exploring Spanking. That gives you that Exquisite release That Blood rush And then the Gentle Sensual Sweetness You could be a Mature, Or Young Experienced or Just Adventurous But that Little girl inside Still Needs that attention I'm 6ft4 Dark hair Green eyes Athletic Easygoing Very broad minded And open So If The instinct is there Don't ignore it Don't be shy Get in touch AXx
